about_the_game: Most of the music in LUMbA: REDUX is comically distorted stock music. We do have original songs, however. Our primary composer, NeatNeet, went crazy and made these crazy electronic breakcore kinda things, and they go pretty hard. THIS IS ONLY NEATNEET'S PORTION OF THE OST, DB's songs are mostly ambient tracks that aren't suited for listening to outside of the game.
detailed_description: Most of the music in LUMbA: REDUX is comically distorted stock music. We do have original songs, however. Our primary composer, NeatNeet, went crazy and made these crazy electronic breakcore kinda things, and they go pretty hard. THIS IS ONLY NEATNEET'S PORTION OF THE OST, DB's songs are mostly ambient tracks that aren't suited for listening to outside of the game.

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 14 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: ~13.1 MB
